resources.string: VLC for Android™ is a port of VLC media player, the popular open source media player. The Android™ version can read most files and network streams.
Enter additional custom directory to scan:
Allow VLC player popup over other apps
VLC needs you to grant this permission display your video in a popup over other applications.
VLC needs you to grant this permission to change your brightness mode.
Allow VLC to change brightness mode
VLC needs you to grant this permission to set up this song as your ringtone.
Allow VLC to set the ringtone
VLC needs you to grant this permission to access the media files on this device.
Allow VLC to access video and audio files
Change the method that VLC uses to output audio.

Edward Wang, Sébastien Toque, Adrien Maglo, Jean-Baptiste Kempf, Ludovic Fauvet, Rafaël Carré, Alexandre Perraud, Michael Merg, Martin Storsjö, Rémi Duraffort, Dominique Martinet, Jean-Philippe André, Felix Abecassis, Christoph Miebach, Hugo Beauzée-Luyssen, Felix Paul Kühne, John Mooring, Pavol Rusnak, Rohit Yadav, Tanguy Pruvot, Thomas Clavier, Asad Mehmood, Garret Kelly, Philipp Dreimann, Walter Heck.
Automatically scan device for new or deleted media at application startup
Press back again to quit video

This is a beta version.

This version is NOT STABLE!

Do NOT use, unless you know what you are doing.

It might kill your kitten and destroy your house.
Use it at your own risk.

Have Fun! :)
You cannot delete the last step
You can\'t remove the last dictionary
Select the language or study the dictionary
RGB 32-bit: default chroma\nRGB 16-bit: better performance but lower quality\nYUV: best performance but does not work on all devices. Android 2.3 and later only.
%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
This version of VLC is compiled by:
Delete the folder \'%1$s\' and all its contents?
if activated you will be asked to confirm when a video can be resumed from last position
Change the deblocking filter settings. Could improve video quality. Advanced users only.
Force hardware decoder, for advanced users only
Select directories to include in the media library
The directory path \'%1$s\' was not found.
Change the interface colours for better comfort in low light environments.
Control brightness by gesture during video playback
Clone the device screen without remote control.
Speed up decoding but could lower video quality.
Pause on headset removal; resume on headset insertion
Show backward and forward buttons on the video interface
Show rewind and forward buttons on the video interface
Avoid conflicts by stealing the remote control from other apps. This prevents dialing on double click on HTC phones.
Speed up and slow down audio without changing the pitch (requires a fast device).
Control volume by gesture during video playback
VLC encountered an error with this media.\nPlease try refreshing the media library.
Warning, encryption is not available for this Android version, password will be stored in a private space but not encrypted
The error in determining the cards
Protected content not supported on API levels below 18
This device does not support the required DRM scheme
The error message is (please mention this when debugging):\n
This device does not provide a decoder for %1$s
This device does not provide a secure decoder for %1$s
Sorry, your device is currently not supported by this version of VLC for Android™.
Sorry, VLC for Android had a problem loading and had to close.
Error in the translation of the word!
No item to display, go to your extension settings to get some.
Show videos in list instead of grid in portrait mode
hardware acceleration error, switching to software decoding
An error occurred with hardware acceleration. Would you like to disable it and try again?
Disabled: better stability.\nDecoding: may improve performance.\nFull: may improve performance further.
Help us improving VLC by sending the following crash log:
Settings when secondary displays are connected (HDMI/Miracast).
This library allows you to include vector icons everywhere in your project. No limits are given. Scale with no limit, use any Color at any time, provide a contour, and many additional customizations
Android Google+ like floating action button which reacts on the list view scrolling events. Becomes visible when the list view is scrolled up and invisible when scrolled down.
Material Design Icons\' growing icon collection allows designers and developers targeting various platforms to download icons in the format, color and size they need for any project.
FastAdapter, the bullet proof, fast and easy to use adapter library, which minimizes developing time to a fraction...
MaterialDrawer the flexible, easy to use, all in one drawer library for your Android project.
Materialize comes with useful helper classes, the complete material color palette, and many additional utils. Use its theme as base. Let it manage your StatusBar, NavigationBar, Fullscreen behavior…
A fast ImageView (and Drawable) that supports rounded corners (and ovals or circles) based on the original example from Romain Guy.
Languages to download when fetching subtitles
When available, set the current media cover art as lockscreen wallpaper
You need to select file with foreign subtitles
You need to select file with foreign subtitles
The amount of time to buffer network media (in ms). Does not work with hardware decoding. Leave blank to reset.
This extension needs your device to be connected to internet
There are no cards with voice
No file picker was found on the system.
You have no playback history yet.
No media files found, please transfer some files to your device or adjust your preferences.
Enter network MRL: e.g. http://, mms:// or rtsp://
Continue video playback in background when turning device screen off or clicking HOME button.
Save all media played in History section
Remember the playback speed you set
Play video in a Pop-Up window
Do you want to remove a dictionary?
An error occurred while setting the ringtone.
The file \'%1$s\' was set as the ringtone.
Remember brightness level in video player
Unfortunately, a serious error has occurred and VLC had to close.
Add a new server to favorites
The server was not found. Check your connection
The server was not found. Check the address in the search string for errors
Quit and restart VLC for changes to take effect.
Permission to access storage was denied
Swipe down this means the card is correctly remembered. Swipe up this card is incorrectly remembered. After 4 successful attempts, the card is removed.
Swipe left or right to flip the card.
Select the dictionary in the top tab. Use the buttons for training new or to repeat old words.
To add new words you can use a built-in web browser
The words are repeated at time intervals. Each stage has a time after which the word becomes available for review. You can edit the number of stages and their duration in the settings.
Change UI to TV adapted theme
Videos are grouped if their first letters are the same.
This feature needs VLC application to be installed on your device
The vocabulary with this name exists
Change the method that VLC uses to output video.
Choose word to get translated. Tap on translated words to save word in your dictionary
